[info]
tilesize=32
#size in pixels
tileimg=images/test.png
#relative file path for image

[tiles]
 :(0,0):0
l:(0,1):1
b:(0,2):0
c:(1,0):0
s:(1,1):0
h:(1,2):0
d:(2,0):0
g:(2,1):0
v:(2,2):2
k:(3,0):2
#continue like this for each tile type
#change coordinates to match tiles.png
#the last character defines walkable/climbable etc.
#0 is passable, 1 is solid, 2 is deathable

[levers]
#(coordinate of lever) : (coordinate to change)->tile to change into & (coordinate to change)->tile to change into

(3,7):(1,19)->l,(1,18)->c

#will change tile at (1,19) to l and will change tile at (1,18) to c when lever is activated

[map]
b                                                                b
b                                                                b
b                                                                b
b                                                                b
b                                                                b
b                                                                b
b                                                                b
b                                                                b
b                                                                b
b                                                                b
b                                                                b
b                                                                b
b                                                                b
b                                                                b
b                                                                b
b                                                                b
